title: Home
content: Home recherche Open science Open science For free and open sharing of research data and publications The services we offer Data Share and access data related to research publications, receive assistance with writing data management plans and depositing your data. Publications Find help with deposits in HAL, managing your digital identity and support for open science publishing. Bibliometrics Receive support on evaluation reports, on-demand bibliometric studies and sets of indicators on the openness of scientific publications. Commitments Université Paris-Saclay is committed to open science. Find out more about the university's ambitions and the resources implemented in: the Single Document for Open Science. Help & Contacts Contact our research coordinators, discover our toolbox and FAQ and subscribe to our newsletter to keep up to date with the university's open science news.
